short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps keep your market buy orders profitable. Also adds some useful features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steam Order Scanner (SORS) is a Google Chrome browser extension which main function is to keep your Steam Community Market buy orders profitable. The extension also adds some useful functionality to the Market pages.
